attributes.action: Make Alan shearer the next England Manager
attributes.additional_details:
Just admitted live on match of the day that he would have the job! 

Better than roy hodgson.

More passion than hodgson.
What more do you want?
attributes.background:
So shearer wants the england job!?

Lets give it to him! Cant do worse than roy!

Chats sense week in week out. Knows his stuff. Wants the job. Players will respect him.

Wont bring rashford on 87th min when 2-1 down to terrible opposition
